REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F RM f1924 reute r f BC-AIM-TELEPHONES-<AIMT> 03-25 0055

TEXT.TITLE: AIM TELEPHONES <AIMT> SELLS DEBT TO SHAREHOLDER
TEXT.BODY: AIM Telephones Inc said it has sold three mln dlrs of nine pct seven-year subordinated notes to principal shareholder <Quince Associates>. The company said it has also issued Quince seven-year warrants to buy 500,000 common shares at six dlrs each. Reuter
